website_summaries.verdict: These masks come with both some potential benefits, such as improved skin tone and texture, and the concern of possible irritation for consumers with sensitive skin.
pros: Five full-face masks that combine moisturizing ingredients including green tea with collagen for results for most in as little as 15 minutes
Some users brag about glowing skin after use
cons: Consumers with sensitive skin may want to use these masks with extra caution, as they have been known to cause irritation or rashes

customer_reviews.title: Who is this fresh faced ingenue? It is me and I am 53!
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my second set of these masks. I loved the way they made my skin feel after the very first use. After the second I thought surely I can tell the difference in my skin but after my third one people kept asking me what I was using. They said I looked so young and fresh. I will continue to use these, I deserve to feel fresh and firm. Try these you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: a.s. dean

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have tried out this product everyday for a week now and I have really seen improvements in my skin! My face feels tightened and smoother than usual. The shipping was way faster than expected. I also bought a whole lot and will probably give my friends and family a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia Li

customer_reviews.title: ... have used these twice so far and I really like them. I try a lot of products
customer_reviews.text: I have used these twice so far and I really like them. I try a lot of products. These work great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The holes that are ment for Eyes and mouth are not cut right they are placed wrong
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvenating and refreshing
customer_reviews.text: Love these masks! They make my face feel refreshed and rejuvenated :) I use once a month and I always look forward to it
customer_reviews.author: Linjpow

customer_reviews.title: Its not a bad mask. Makes skin look better temporarily
customer_reviews.text: Its not a bad mask. Makes skin look better temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: skrug

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought the product for my sisters. They both raved about it!
customer_reviews.author: Elsa Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Worth Trying
customer_reviews.text: A wonderful mask which is easy to apply and use!
customer_reviews.author: LAB

customer_reviews.title: Keep young young looking
customer_reviews.text: Daughter in law loved these. Still using after going home.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Newcomb

customer_reviews.title: Burns
customer_reviews.text: This burns and is so watery that it won't stay in place. Threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Fine mask. Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Fine mask. Easy to put on. But gave me a bad rash and I broke out the day after. I don't normally have a sensitive skin. Will not reorder.
customer_reviews.author: A.A.

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me
customer_reviews.text: I wear many masks and this one didn’t feel that the skin was absorbing was messy even if I let sit for more the 20 min. I didn’t have that great feel next morning
customer_reviews.author: carla

customer_reviews.title: Love the fresh and soft feeling after every use
customer_reviews.text: Love the fresh and soft feeling after every use! Perfect for aging skin like mine. I am in my mid 30's and i am outdoor a lot. This helped improve my skin's texture. I always have small bumps and fine lines. This is effective.
customer_reviews.author: jayvee tamboong

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: These are great and definitely make your skin feel amazing. I use it every week and have seen my skin looking brighter!
customer_reviews.author: Malannd

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Have only used once. Didn't notice much of a change but sure felt good to lay down with something cool on your face.
customer_reviews.author: jayhawk

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. I can't believe how young my skin looks ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I can't believe how young my skin looks after I use this. I am 65 and highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Collagen face mask
customer_reviews.text: The mask feels great and comes with a lot of serum, however that is overshadowed by the poor fit. I wear the masks after getting out of the shower, so that I can "get ready" with it on. I can't really do that with these, because they start sliding off. The forehead area fits fine, it's from the nose to the chin that fits horribly. The separation from the nose to the mouth is way to big and loose, the mouth hole is too big and the mask extends way beyond the jawline which causes the mask to slide off even more. I will not be purchasing these again.
customer_reviews.author: Bevin

customer_reviews.title: I give this a five because the moisture is wonderful. Your face feels great during/after
customer_reviews.text: I give this a five because the moisture is wonderful. Your face feels great during/after. I don't notice any miracles but your skin cant help but look moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Woods

customer_reviews.title: Love this mask!
customer_reviews.text: Wish these weren't an add on item because I really use these! Mask feels cooling on and leaves my skin looking wonderful. I keep these on hand always!
customer_reviews.author: ewilmax1

customer_reviews.title: Nothing special - doesn't stay on, poor material
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stick to face, doesn't feel moisturizing or effective at all.
customer_reviews.author: becca r

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like using different masks and I liked how these made my skin feel !
customer_reviews.author: Joyfully yours

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does not give as much glow to the face! In addition its fidelity to put on !
customer_reviews.author: Classy9999

customer_reviews.title: Good Mask.....Good Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Coenzyme Q10 Collagen Mask at TJ Maxx for $5.99. I have expensive and inexpensive masks in both sheet and cream. This one is in the good catergory vs. very good-fair-poor. All these sheet masks fit a little different so just pull the mask up to allow for a better fit around the mouth and nose area. Has plenty of solution on it to rub on your neck as well. I have sensitive skin and this was non-irritating. I did rinse afterwords as it is a little sticky. Then applied my usual serums and moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mask
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on the face and I'm trying to use once a week - but turning out to be twice a week. Skin feels softer after 1st use.
customer_reviews.author: jan l

customer_reviews.title: I love this sheet mask
customer_reviews.text: I love this sheet mask, very good price. I use this after shower while I dry my hair, and put my clothes on, very convenient. It keeps my skin looks fresh and moist even after I wear makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Cindypark

customer_reviews.title: Just love to put it on for 20 min
customer_reviews.text: I just lo.......ve this product. I have a dry skin and I put this mask on every other days. (price is incredible) It moisturizes my skin and gives me a soothing effect. Just love to put it on for 20 min. and meditate. All my stress is gone!!
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product! I could see results the next morning ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I could see results the next morning after using it the night before. I left the mask on for 45 minutes instead of the reommended 20 min. I will order again!
customer_reviews.author: cbass

customer_reviews.title: My face is very sticky after I removed the mask ...
customer_reviews.text: My face is very sticky after I removed the mask. I have to wash my face even the instruction says no need to. Other then that it is an okay product. I won't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lau

customer_reviews.title: yet it irritated my face so bad had to get Rex to bring swelling down
customer_reviews.text: This product is for sensitive skin, yet it irritated my face so bad had to get Rex to bring swelling down , be aware I would give it a less than zero.
customer_reviews.author: RLM

customer_reviews.title: Nice mask, very moisturizing and calming on the skin
customer_reviews.text: Used it and loved it. My fave has not been that smooth in a long time. Even the next day with my make up on, still felt moisture from the mask. Not oily at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Whitlock

customer_reviews.title: I just started using it. So far I have ...
customer_reviews.text: I just started using it. So far I have noticed my skin is tighter, face is smoother, lines and wrinkles less noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: doyle

product_meta.title: Bio-Miracle Anti-Aging and Moisturizing Face Mask, Collagen, 5 Count
product_meta.description: Scent Name:Collagen| Size:5 CountBio Miracle anti-aging and moisturizing face mask is a great form of skincare that moisturizes and nourishes in just 20 minutes. The Bio-Miracle mask revitalizes your skin with an instant lifting effect that leaves you looking visibly younger in just one treatment. This aloe mask specifically hydrates and moisturizes, while effectively minimizing and reducing fine lines and wrinkles. The Bio-Miracle mask is the world's best disposable face mask. In order to target specific needs of every user, the Bio-Miracle mask is also available in green tea, rose, vitamin C and collagen.
feature_bullets: Reduces fine lines and wrinkles, brightens skin texture
Made from the finest collagen essence
